titleStmt.title: By the Protector. A proclamation for putting the lavvs in execution for setting prices on wines.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to his Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at White-Hall this 20. day of July 1655.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
